meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Jordan Helaine Greenfeld Sunny Stalter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6235.

td.p: John Jordan, a university English teacher from Fort Collins, Colorado
Helaine Greenfeld, a government attorney from Chevy Chase, Maryland
Sunny Stalter, an English professor from Auburn, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,200)

tr.td: CASEY AT THE BAT
THE 1600s
IN THE DICTIONARY
THE SHAPE OF THINGS
LAND IDAHO!
KEYBOARD NEIGHBORS
(Alex: Each correct response will be two letters that you find on your keyboard side-by-side.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Future Major Leaguer Casey Kotchman hit .456 to help lead Seminole High in this state to the 2001 national title')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Future Major Leaguer Casey Kotchman hit .456 to help lead Seminole High in this state to the 2001 national title

tr.td: Sunny
Helaine

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Sunny
Helaine
John
(Alex: Today, we celebrate the 125th anniversary of the dedication of...)
THE STATUE OF LIBERTY
RUSSIAN COMPOSERS
MEANINGFUL STAGE NAMES
WHERE'S THE PROBLEM?
(Alex: You have to name the body part.)
LIBRARIES
(Alex: And what happens in a library?...)
"SH"!
